description: Variation of Condition 3 (Hours of Operation) of planning ref 16/13052/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (plans) of planning permission 16/13052/FUL (Change of use from Restaurant (Use Class A3) to Hot Food Takeaway (Use Class A5). External alterations comprising a new timber shopfront, and a new extract grille, condenser unit and extraction flue on the rear elevation) to amend front elevation to provide separate doorway to upper floor flat) to allow customer opening hours between the hours of 11am and 5am 7 days per week
decision_conditions: The proposal fails to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed increase in customer opening hours between the hours of 11.00am and 5.00am 7 days per week would not cause noise and disturbance to the detriment of residential amenity. The proposal, therefore, conflicts with the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) and Policy DM 10 of the Council's adopted Core Strategy (2012).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 25 (Traffic Management) of planning permission 17/12114/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please provide copies of all existing and proposed elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, north point, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.
